title: Teachers' TPACK Levels and Interactive Whiteboard Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory concepts and introductory experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Learner cohort primarily consisting of pre-service teachers or teaching credential candidates, with practical learning needs grounded in actual lesson design experiences

learning_goals: Explain the interaction of TPACK components (Technological, Pedagogical, and Content Knowledge)
Propose a TPACK framework application for designing interactive whiteboard-based lessons
Analyze a teacher TPACK evaluation system using mixed research methods (surveys, interviews)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
